selections.name: I C U IN MY DREAMS (IRE)
selections.reason: Strongest form in the field (2-1-7), including a win in a Point-to-Point and a solid 2nd in a Class 5 NH Flat race. The clear standout on paper.

selections.name: LUNA GRACE
selections.reason: Consistent performer with two 3rd place finishes in similar company. Receives weight allowance as a 4yo.

selections.name: ARISTELLE
selections.reason: Showed improvement to finish 3rd in a Class 5 recently. Valid place contender.

danger_horse.name: LITTLE RUBY
danger_horse.reason: Debutante for Mark Walford; watch market moves.

selections.name: LE BEAU MADRIK (FR)
selections.reason: Won a Class 2 Maiden Hurdle last time out. Drops to Class 4 here, representing a significant class edge. Trainer Dan Skelton is a top conditioner.

selections.name: EAGLES REPRIEVE (IRE)
selections.reason: Very consistent (1-2-2) record. Won a maiden hurdle recently and followed up with a solid 2nd. The main threat.

selections.name: LOULOU MADRIK (FR)
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time out, showing improvement. Solid place chance.

danger_horse.name: BUDDAH CASTLE (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Has winning form and point-to-point experience.

selections.name: SPADESTEP (IRE)
selections.reason: The 4/5 favorite for a reason. Excellent recent form (2-2-1) and highest speed figures in the group. Looks hard to beat.

selections.name: PONY SOPRANO (IRE)
selections.reason: Drops into a manageable spot. Has shown ability in Class 3 chases previously.

selections.name: THE GRAFTER (IRE)
selections.reason: Consistent placer (2nd last two starts). Reliable for exotics.

danger_horse.name: DOUBLE DIGITS
danger_horse.reason: Capable of hitting the board on best form.

selections.name: KALO ATHENA (IRE)
selections.reason: Coming off a win in a conditional handicap hurdle. In good form cycle and well-weighted.

selections.name: DILLARCHIE
selections.reason: Consistent recent form (2nd, 7th, 6th). Should be competitive in this Class 5 field.

selections.name: FIVEAFTERFOUR (IRE)
selections.reason: Has shown flashes of ability despite recent trouble (Unseated/Fell). If he stands up, he figures.

danger_horse.name: EIRE STREET (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Top weight but drops in class.

selections.name: PITWOOD ROAD
selections.reason: Won last time out in a Class 5 handicap hurdle. Maintains form and looks the one to beat.

selections.name: LIZZIE LUNA
selections.reason: Consistent runner (2nd, 3rd recently). Reliable option for the placings.

selections.name: JUST CALL ME LUCY
selections.reason: Solid 2nd two starts back. Fits well in this company.

selections.name: THE BIG BREAC (IRE)
selections.reason: Most consistent recent form (4-3-1). Good recent speed figures relative to this field.

selections.name: IF NOT FOR DYLAN (IRE)
selections.reason: Has run well in higher classes. 4th and 3rd in recent starts suggest readiness.

selections.name: MAROWN (IRE)
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time out after a string of pull-ups. Back on track.

selections.name: VELVET VULCAN
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish. Looks the most likely winner in a weak field.

selections.name: SNOW DRAGON (IRE)
selections.reason: Consistent with back-to-back 3rd place finishes. Should be in the mix.

selections.name: TIME WAS (IRE)
selections.reason: Finished 4th recently and has previous 2nd place form. Place contender.

danger_horse.name: GONNINO (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Finished 2nd two starts back; inconsistent but dangerous.
